aboutUs.title: About
summary: As a Software Engineer with 3.5+ years of professional experience, I specialize in building secure, scalable, and high-performance backend systems for enterprise-grade SaaS platforms across banking, finance, and logistics domains.

My work focuses on designing Spring Boot microservices, developing RESTful APIs, and implementing event-driven architectures that process millions of transactions with 99.99% uptime. I have architected and modernized large-scale systems from legacy platforms into cloud-native microservices, integrating with financial and logistics APIs, and deploying resilient services on AWS using Docker, Terraform, and CI/CD pipelines.

My expertise includes Spring Data JPA, Hibernate, Spring Security, Apache Camel, RabbitMQ, database optimization, and implementing secure authentication and authorization mechanisms for sensitive data.
I am also an active writer on [Medium](https://medium.com/@viswachand19), where I share insights on backend engineering, cloud-native architectures, and best practices in software design.
Outside my professional work, I love photography, exploring nature, and capturing creative perspectives through my lens.

keyCompetencies.title: Accountable:
keyCompetencies.description: Proven experience in delivering scalable and secure backend systems with measurable business impact.

keyCompetencies.title: Team Player:
keyCompetencies.description: Collaborates effectively with cross-functional teams including product, DevOps, QA, and frontend engineering.

keyCompetencies.title: Agile and Adaptable:
keyCompetencies.description: Thrives in fast-paced environments and quickly adapts to evolving requirements and technologies.

keyCompetencies.title: Positive Influence:
keyCompetencies.description: Drives new initiatives and continuous improvement across development and deployment workflows.

education.degree: Master of Science (MS) in Computer Science

experience.buttonText: Find Moonraft journey in this article
experience.title: Software Engineer
Description: Moonraft Innovation Labs is a customer experience and innovation firm that combines design, technology, and data to deliver cutting-edge digital solutions. As part of the engineering team, I contributed to modernizing Punjab National Bank's core banking systems into a secure SaaS platform using the Spring ecosystem.

Led backend development of customer-facing banking portals serving 3M+ users, by designing and implementing secure, scalable microservices with Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, and Spring Security, reducing branch-based queries by 40%.
Integrated Finacle Core Banking APIs into a microservices architecture, improving transaction workflows and delivering a 30% reduction in API latency under high concurrency.
Engineered a loan approval engine capable of handling large-volume data with optimized JPA/Hibernate queries and asynchronous workflows, accelerating decision-making by 70%.
Implemented message-driven communication with RabbitMQ for reliable, high-throughput inter-service messaging, maintaining 99.99% uptime.
Deployed containerized services on AWS (EC2, RDS, S3, API Gateway) using Terraform and CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time by 50% and enabling seamless horizontal scaling.

experience.buttonText: Find Good Crop journey in this article
experience.title: Software Engineer
Description: Good Crop IT is a software solutions company delivering enterprise-grade platforms. I worked on modernizing a legacy logistics system into a cloud-based SaaS platform with Spring Boot microservices and AWS.

Modernized a legacy IBM AS/400 logistics system into a SaaS platform by architecting microservices with Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, Hibernate, and Spring Security — delivering 99.99% uptime and enabling secure, high-performance operations.
Engineered RESTful APIs to integrate with FedEx and USPS services, handling millions of transactions and improving shipping speed while reducing errors through secure API design and validation.
Implemented event-driven workflows using RabbitMQ for real-time barcode scanning, automated routing, and dynamic inventory updates, reducing manual labor dependency by 40%.
Optimized data access layers with JPA/Hibernate and PostgreSQL, improving query performance and ensuring ACID compliance in distributed environments.
Deployed containerized backend services on AWS using Docker, Terraform, and GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines, accelerating release cycles by 60% and enabling seamless scaling.
